summary: Donald A. Purdy, Jr. was an employee of the Select Committee on Assassinations (SCA). The documents provided are payroll and certification reports that list Purdy's name, salary, and employment dates. He appears in payroll certifications for April 1978 and August 1978, as well as a certification report for December 1978. These documents indicate that Purdy was employed by the SCA during these periods.
significance: Donald A. Purdy, Jr.'s significance lies in his employment with the Select Committee on Assassinations.
